creator: bram@xspace.com
text:
When trying to read multipart/form-data, it was noticed that I was unable to
properly read in a gif file of any size.  I am relatively certain it is because
of a NUL character on the input stream, although it may be some other character.

In any event, my setup is through apache 1.3.17 and works only with AJP12.  I
the setup is through a virtual host on both apache and tomcat -- however, I
suspect that is not related.

When I attempt to mount with ajp13 the inputstream terminates prematurely
making it impossible to read in virtually any binary file.

creator: lichtin@bivio.com
text:
Just wanted to say that we can confirm the bug.
Any fixes yet?

creator: lichtin@bivio.com
text: Well, looks like this bug is fixed in 3.2.2.

creator: marc.saegesser@apropos.com
text: *** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 1673 ***
